thread.title: Dollar Climbs, Following U.S. Government Bond Yields

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Climbs, Following U.S. Government Bond Yields
text:
The dollar climbed Tuesday, following U.S. government bond yields higher.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently up 0.5% to 83.58.
Rising Treasury yields sometimes make the dollar more attractive to investors seeking income. That relationship has been tested in recent... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
